other_tests.findings: Complete conduction block proximal to the head of the fibula of the right peroneal nerve, a partial conduction block of the left ulnar nerve between the axilla and elbow, and a suspected partial motor conduction block of the left peroneal nerve distal to the head of the fibula.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Disease progression observed with complete conduction block of the right peroneal and left ulnar nerve and partial conduction block of the left peroneal nerve.

other_tests.findings: Marked improvement in ability to perform activities of daily living for 6 weeks, but the response decreased with subsequent treatments.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Intervals of IVIg administration decreased over time, requiring switch to biweekly and then weekly administrations.

other_tests.findings: Well-tolerated treatment with no adverse effects and extended intervals between IVIg from 7 to 10 days after 6 months.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Subsequent yearly courses maintained the interval of IVIg administration at 12 days.
